name: Rpg Forever - Serens Quest
description:
Your memories are gone. You find yourself in a new world . now you must journey to find new meaning to life. Save the People of Maiko from imminent demise and maybe along the way you can save yourself.

Join us on this our first epic role playing game experience. Rpg Forever is a Tale that will have you asking for more!

Built using rpg maker mv.Rmmv. Be sure to stay tuned for updates!
